about.name: Iuliana
about.information:
I have been engaged in graphic design since 2007. I regularly improve my skills and follow new trends. I try to keep abreast of new products in the field of advertising, design and a little art. There is an experience of creating web interfaces and services for business automation. In addition to design, I'm interested in psychology, literature on self-development and fiction.
Inspired by: music, yoga, zenart.
My hobby is spiritual self-development in society. So I write a book and articles that change and expand the mind.
I took part in social projects as one of the organizers of the community, created to unite initiative groups and like-minded people who are trying to create a world of kindness, mutual assistance and support. Organized and conducted a series of team quest games "Relay race". Support was also provided for charitable events to raise funds and help special children.
